channel.title: SevenAtSevenSection1

item.title: Trump Often Repeats These False, Misleading Immigration Claims. Here Are the Facts.
item.description: The more someone hears something, the more likely they are to believe it, even when it’s false. Trump has made some of these claims 500 times or more.

item.title: The Next Front in the War Over Homelessness Is on the Arizona Ballot
item.description: Conservatives want to use the criminal justice system to force unhoused people into treatment. It may do more harm than good.

item.title: The True, Massive Cost of Trump’s Mass Deportation Plans
item.description: Along with immense human suffering, deporting millions of people could cost billions and damage the economy, according to several recent analyses.
